pageProduct.name: Alkira Detoxifying Anti-Pollution Facial Masque 100ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Super Pore-Detox + Deep Clean + Blemish Control. Combines a dream team of skin detoxing, micro-buffing, citric and salicylic acids and antibacterial plant extracts to help improve blemish prone skin.

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, rinse immediately and discontinue use. We recommend patch testing. For external use only.

Common Uses

Key Benefits: Antibacterial and anti-inflammatory rich Australian native complex of Tasmanian Blue Gum and Lemon and Aniseed Myrtle to balance blemish prone skin Contains Willow Bark, a pore minimising, uneven skin tone correcting and anti-inflammatory Australian Clay + Charcoal + Key Lime for a deep cleanse A super charged antioxidant complex of Blackwood Wattle, Tasmanian Pepper Berry, Moringa, Rosehip and Rooibos to help promote healthy skin Skin softening Coconut, Jojoba and Cucumber

Ingredients

Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Kaolin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Bentonite, Palmitic Acid, Ceteareth-20, Stearic Acid, Charcoal Powder, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Fruit Oil, Backhousia Citriodora (Lemon Myrtle) Leaf Oil, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Citrus Aurantifolia (Key Lime) Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Kunzea Pomifera (Emu Apple) Fruit Extract, Aspalathus Linearis (Rooibos) Leaf Extract, Eucalyptus Globulus (Tasmanian Blue Gum) Leaf Extract, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Myrtillus (Bilberry) Fruit Extract, Cucumis Sativa (Cucumber) Extract, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Tasmannia Lanceolata (Pepper) Fruit Extract, Backhousia Anisata (Aniseed Myrtle) Leaf Extract, Acacia Melanoxylon (Blackwood) Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower, Water (Aqua), Tocopherol (vitamin E), Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol Linalool*Limonene* Citral**Allergens

Directions

Apply to damp face and neck. Relax and allow to penetrate for 15 minutes. Rinse off with warm water and wash cloth
